items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress
items.body: I really did like this dress and it looked so nice but it was broken when it came. Wish i coulda wore it and plan to buy it again! It looked so good on and if i knew how to sew i would have just fixed the strap myself bc it was so cute Read more
items.author: Ajsia martocchia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Girrrllllll!
items.body: I purchased this last minute for a comedy show and Iâ€™m so glad I did. I loved it. It was stretchy and hugged my curves in all the right places. The dress looks a little transparent but the brown color keeps it from being too see through. I put on dark black undies in order to ensure it wasnâ€™t so transparent. I ended up taking the rhinestone buttons off because I felt like it didnâ€™t match since they were silver and I was wearing gold accessories. They were very easy to just cut off with scissors. Careful not to cut the dress in the process. I ordered a size medium. Iâ€™m a 34 D, 158 lbs and 5â€™2. My hip size is 44. I can normally wear a small or medium depending on the cut and fabric. I went with a medium to give me a little more wiggle room and ensure the length would not be too short. The medium was perfect. The color is a chocolate brown and does not vary much from the outline photo. The straps that come across the front are a little adjustable. I loved the quality, fit, and price for this little number. 10/10 recommend! Read more
items.author: c Mac

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous Dress
items.body: Worked perfectly for the club. Wanted something that wasnâ€™t too short, but showed a little skin. The dress feels good quality, zipper is smooth and the dress isnâ€™t see through at all. Only problem I had with it was figuring out how to put it on, felt like I needed instructions to figure out the top laces. But once I got past that itâ€™s an amazing dress, very flattering. Iâ€™m 5â€™4â€ 135lbs and ordered a small Read more
items.author: Kristen Rogers

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but cheap
items.body: Loved the stretch, was pleasantly surprised that the top part sat nicely. Material is decent and wasnâ€™t see through! Iâ€™m 210, 45-36-48 for reference. Disliked the length - SO short (Iâ€™m barely 5â€™7â€) I canâ€™t walk in it without my butt hanging out. The rhinestone beads on the front are super cheap and tacky in person. If it were a little longer I may have kept it, but overall I felt like the length + beads made it looks really cheap and Iâ€™ll be returning. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute Dress!
items.body: The material is great, soft and stretchy, but not see-through, and it hugs and the body in all the right places while still being comfortable, and stretchy enough to wear all day. It's the perfect length and price! Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yes to the dress!!
items.body: This dress is EVERYTHING!!! It made me feel incredibly sexy. I wore it in Vegas and I got so many compliments all night!! I am definitely going to buy it in another color. Read more
items.author: Chad Pope

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Ruched Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Ruched Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Brown, Plum, White, A Black, Blue, Purple, B Black, Orange. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
